评论概述: Material is pretty stiff for pants
评论详情: It fits fine when I’m not moving but these feel like the kind of pants that would tear is you sat down wrong or squated just a little too low. I feel like clothing for everyday wear (in general) should be able to allow for the full range of motion for each of the limbs that piece encompasses. For example I wouldn’t be very happy if I put on a jacket and could barely touch the top of my head. Who knows maybe I got the wrong size but seeing that it fits how it should in a static state I think it’s just either the make or use of material. I love pants and I guess I’m kinda picky about them.

This was our second pair to go through as the first pair we got the crotch split open at school when my kid was wearing them the first time and sat down. We sent the first pair back and got these second pair as the replacement. The style is on trend but they need to be made better.

My son loved these initially but after ONE wash they shrunk 2-3 sizes and went from being pants that touched his ankles to being almost shorts that hit barely over the knee. Also multiple seams came undone after one wash.  Have sent them back for full refund and will not purchase from this vendor again.  Any pants that shrink that much after one wash are not made from quality material.
